resources.string: Install this application? It will have access to:
Install an update to this existing application? Your existing data will not be lost. The updated application will have access to:
An update to this built-in app will be installed. Your existing data will not be lost. The updated app will have access to:
For security reasons, your device is currently set to block installation of applications not obtained from Play Store. To change this, go to Settings > Security > Unknown sources.

For security reasons, your device is currently set to block the installation of apps that were not obtained from Play Store. To change this, go to Settings > Lock screen and security, then turn on Unknown sources.
%1$s wants to install other apps. Allow this now and in future?
The application will be replaced with the factory version.
There is a problem parsing the package.
This update does not require any new permissions.
